notes: Brand new modern apartment in excellent condition with high-end finishes including marble-tiled bathrooms with bathtub and washer/dryer, sleek white kitchen cabinetry, and recessed lighting throughout. Very clean with no visible baby safety concerns - flat single-level layout with no stairs, frosted glass balcony doors provide privacy. Natural light appears limited due to frosted windows, but the unit is unfurnished and move-in ready.
